description: Long-term supply forecast dataset containing historical, current, and forward-lookings power and space projections with CAGR metrics by geography and property type.

Cloud deployment capabilities view detailing cloud provider presence, data center locations, operational status, node types, availability zones, and hierarchical geographic attributes for market and infrastructure analysis.

Market intelligence comparables dataset used for competitive benchmarking of data center lease transactions. The table enables comparison of lease economics, power and space commitments, redundancy, product type, customer profiles, and deal terms across different providers, markets, regions, and sign quarters to evaluate relative performance, efficiency, and pricing.

Site-level global capacity reporting view providing visibility into vacant, under-construction, expiring, and future data center capacity across markets, properties, and regions for supply availability analysis.

Historical snapshot view of data center supply metrics by quarter, capturing space and power capacity, availability, ownership, product type, provider, geography, and operational status for quarter-over-quarter trend analysis.
